job_description: Senior Java Engineer (Temp) - job post Worldwide Express 157 reviews Dallas, TX 75219 • Remote Temporary Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Job Type Temporary PURPOSE Worldwide Express is building a next generation cloud native platform serving customers and internal users, the Senior Java Software Engineer will be responsible for building and maintaining Java applications to support our business needs. This includes stand-alone applications as well as Web applications all supporting internal and customer facing business processes. ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES Develop and maintain Java applications in the development and test environments. Create coding and design guidelines to be used throughout our applications. Work with architecture team to define development toolset. Assist in organization code review process. Assist in the development of technical requirements for Agile development teams. Develop updates, corrections, or enhancements including Business Logic in Java & SQL as well as User Interfaces in HTML and JavaScript. Provide analysis and recommendations for external Java technologies which could enhance and improve products to meet business needs. Assist operations team on application deployment Issues. Integrate with other technologies using iPaaS, Rest API, Web Services, EDI, XML, and SQL. Work with DevOps teams to facilitate deployment of code artifacts to Cloud based environments Responsible for data security and web site intrusion defenses of Java applications Support the overall SDLC process including continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE/SKILLS/ABILITIES Understanding of the industry, specific WWEX business model, and unique characteristics of the Company Working in collaborative relationships across teams, leaders and vendors Verbal and written communication skills Conflict management and problem-solving Assessment and decision-making skills Relationship building both within the organization and with external sources Presentation and facilitation skills Analytical Troubleshooting Deductive and inductive reasoning Critical thinking Forward thinking Operational Expertise QUALIFICATIONS: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or relevant field. 3-5 or more years development experience using Java, HTML, and JavaScript in a J2EE environment. Strong background in creating multi-threaded Java applications Experience with JDBC, Relational Databases like MySQL, Postgres and NoSQL databases like MongoDB, etc. Experience with JPA and Hibernate, MyBatis, etc Experience with caching technologies such as Redis or Ehcache. Experience with Spring based REST services 1+ years of experience in native cloud application development experience in AWS. 1+ years of experience in integration platforms like Mulesoft 2+ years knowledge and work experience in XML or EDI for integrating with trading partners. 2+ years of experience in creating applications with RESTful APIs/JSON, Microservices or service-oriented architecture. Experience developing Secure web applications containing financial data. Experience developing enterprise software through several complete development lifecycles. Experience configuring CI/CD systems such as Jenkins. Functional knowledge of Java based IDEs and development tools. Excellent Troubleshooting skills. Excellent judgment and the ability to handle escalated situations. Motivated to learn and grow in experience and knowledge If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.

Senior UI Software Engineer (Temp) - job post Worldwide Express 157 reviews Dallas, TX 75219 • Remote Temporary Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Job Type Temporary PURPOSE Worldwide Express is building a next generation cloud native platform serving customers and internal users, the Senior UI Software Engineer will be responsible for building and maintaining a new customer experience through front end UI applications to support our business needs. They will serve as the technical lead for software development projects and help maintain design principles and guidelines across our applications. This includes stand-alone applications as well as Web based applications supporting internal and customer facing business processes. ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES Develop and maintain greenfield user interface designs in the development and test environments. Assist in creation of coding guidelines and design standards to be used throughout our front-end applications. Mentor other developers and ensure coherent development practices. Work with architecture team to define development toolset. Assist in the development of technical requirements for Agile development teams. Develop updates, corrections, or enhancements including Business Logic for User Interfaces in HTML and JavaScript. Provide analysis and recommendations for external UI frameworks or libraries which could enhance and improve products to meet business needs. Work with Operations Team on Application Deployment Issues. Integrate with other technologies using REST, XML, EDI and SQL. Responsible for data security and web site intrusion defenses of web applications. Develop technical processes and to support the overall SDLC process including continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE/SKILLS/ABILITIES Verbal and written communication skills. Conflict management and problem-solving. Assessment and decision-making skills. Relationship building both within the organization and with external sources. Presentation and facilitation skills. Analytical. Troubleshooting. Deductive and inductive reasoning. Critical thinking. Forward thinking. Operational Expertise. QUALIFICATIONS: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or relevant field 3 - 5 years of front-end UI development utilizing Angular, Bootstrap, Ionic, or similar technologies. 3 or more years knowledge and work experience in XML or EDI for integrating with trading partners. 2 - 3 years of native cloud application development experience in AWS. 5 years of work experience creating applications Experience developing Secure web applications containing financial data. Experience developing enterprise software through several complete development lifecycles. Technical Leadership over projects with 6 or more engineers. Experience creating technical design and architecture for a software tool Experience configuring CI/CD systems. Functional knowledge of relevant IDEs and SCM development tools. Excellent Troubleshooting skills. Excellent judgment and the ability to handle escalated situations. Motivated to learn and grow in experience and knowledge.
